Use it as a makeshift sling: If someone has an injured arm, a tie can be used to make a sling by knotting it and placing it around the arm and neck.
Secure a purse strap: A tie can be used to secure a loose purse strap by knotting it around the handle.
Tie up curtains: Ties can be used to tie up curtains or drapes to prevent them from swinging out of control.
Make a makeshift belt: During hikes or while camping, a tie can be used to make a makeshift belt to secure a jacket or pants.
Create a makeshift umbrella: In place of an umbrella, a tie can be used to create a makeshift shield against the rain.
